content: off pu = pick up bor = beginning of round pwise = purlwise cc = contrasting colour rem = remaining circ s = circular needle s repeat = repeat cn = cable needle rev st st = reverse stockinette stitch co = cast on round s = round s dpn s = double pointed needle s rs = right side decrease s = decrease s skp = slip one stitch knit one stich pass slipped stitch increase = increase over knitted stitch decrease k = knit sl = slip k2tog = knit two stitches together decrease sl m = slip marker kfb = knit into front and back of stitch increase ssk = slip slip knit two slipped stitches together ktbl = knit through back loop decrease kwise = knitwise sssk = slip slip slip knit all slipped stitches together m = marker double decrease m1 = make one increase st s = stitche s m1l = left slanting increase st st = stockinette stitch / stocking stitch m1r = right slanting increase tbl = through back loops mc = main colour decrease = together p = purl ws = wrong side p2tog = purl two stitches together decrease wyib = with yarn in back patt = pattern wyif = with yarn in front pm = place marker yo = yarn over hope you enjoyed the pattern thanks from bohoknits #sillyheartshawl
